title: Reflection
text:
“Reflection on the use of GenAI 𓂃🖊”


The integration of Generative AI (GenAI) into everyday tasks has been transformative, offering unparalleled efficiency and creative possibilities. It serves as a powerful tool for generating ideas, refining complex concepts, and automating repetitive tasks. Through natural language interactions, GenAI simplifies problem-solving, making it accessible across diverse fields, from education to business. However, its use also raises important considerations, such as ethical implications, potential over-reliance, and the need for critical evaluation of outputs to ensure accuracy and reliability. While GenAI is a remarkable technological advancement, it is most effective when paired with human oversight, creativity, and judgment. Reflecting on its impact, it is evident that responsible adoption of GenAI can enhance productivity and innovation while emphasizing the importance of maintaining human expertise as a guiding force.

title: Other Projects
text:
Data Analysis (Land Transport Authority)

Tableau:


Configuring and modifying data filtration features within existing Tableau dashboards.  
Learning how to clean and prepare datasets before loading them onto Tableau Server.  
Building dashboards from scratch based on requested features.  
Modifying and migrating past and present employee data, including training programs, proficiencies, and matching staff lists.  
Identifying areas of improvement in existing dashboards to ensure consistency in data quality and appearance.

title: Other Projects
text:
Front End Web Developer (Impossible Marketing) 🌐🕸💻

WordPress:


Content Management Systems (CMS): Specialized in developing websites for clients’ specific content management needs. Using systems such as WordPress.  
SEO Integration: Collaborated with SEO experts within the agency to improve on-page SEO for digital marketing, optimizing tags, speed, and site performance. Higher traffic was observed among a dozen websites with an increase of 15-20% in website traffic.  
Client Interaction: Interacted closely with clients to gather project requirements and offer technical insights, enhancing further communication and client-facing skills towards most future projects.   -[Websites I’ve done under this internship]:  ETAG RFID  Bites and Scratches  TVB Anywhere  Flagship Games
